original_text: I continued to look at the four living things. Each of them had a wheel on the ground at its side.
korean_text: 내가 그 생물들을 보니 그 생물들 곁에 있는 땅 위에는 바퀴가 있는데 그 네 얼굴을 따라 하나씩 있고

sentences.original_text: I continued to look at the four living things.
Each of them had a wheel on the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 각자는 땅에 바퀴를 가지고 있었다.
